feed.title: Combined summary - Anything to chat about today at 21:00 UTC ?

entry.title: Combined summary - Anything to chat about today at 21:00 UTC ?
entry.summary: Gavin Andresen, a prominent figure in the Bitcoin community, announced an upcoming Tuesday IRC meeting on the #bitcoin-development IRC channel. The meeting will cover various topics including the duplicate coinbase attack/fix and the strategy for rolling out sipa's fix. Additionally, the 0.6 release schedule will be discussed along with potential solutions to attract a talented Windows developer to address ongoing issues. Lastly, the meeting will cover the next-steps for multisignature and who is working on what.The discussion during the meeting revolves around attracting a great Windows developer. One suggestion is to utilize the possibility of free advertising for open source projects on StackOverflow, specifically targeting Windows developers. The link provided leads to a meta StackOverflow post about open source advertising for sidebar 1H 2012. The poster believes that it shouldn't be difficult to get 30 votes with some help from the forum.
